Smart Clothes Iron: This is an iron that has a built-in AI system that can detect the type of fabric being ironed and adjust the heat and steam settings accordingly. It can also automatically detect when a garment is wrinkled and will iron it without the need for manual input.

Portable Clothes Iron: This is a clothes iron that is small enough to be taken on the go, making it perfect for travel or for those who live in small spaces. It has a rechargeable battery and a compact design that makes it easy to store.

Self-Cleaning Clothes Iron: This is an iron that has a self-cleaning mechanism that removes any buildup of mineral deposits and residue that can occur over time. It also has a long-lasting heating element that reduces the need for frequent cleaning and maintenance.

SmarT Iron: This is an iron that has a built-in Bluetooth speaker, allowing users to listen to music or podcasts while they iron. It also has a smartphone app that allows users to control the iron's settings and receive notifications when the iron is turned on or off.

Anti-Calcium Clothes Iron: This is an iron that has a special coating that prevents calcium buildup, which can damage irons over time. It also has a unique design that allows it to heat up faster and maintain a consistent temperature, making it ideal for ironing delicate fabrics.
